a-small: the trivia game that will make you a genius
a-div: in this app you will enjoy a beautiful game experience! the game has many categories, while each one of them has 3 levels for its own. Each level itself includes 10 rounds! while the last question in each one is a Country question. in addition, you can add questions by yourself and see them while you play!
sign-small: the game that will make you a genius
modal-desc: hover the level to see the exact points amount
